title: Drag Race Belgique
overview: After a dazzling first season, the biggest Drag Queen competition returns to brighten up all this greyness.As mistress of ceremonies, we find Rita Baga who will present for the second year in a row the second season of Drag Race Belgique. At her side, an exceptional duo to find THE best Belgian Drag Queen: the singer Lio and the singer Mustii.Who better than this trio to guide our Queens towards the coveted Drag Race Belgique Superstar crown?Â The 9 Queens will have to stand out through small and big challenges, lip-syncs and other parades of all kinds and redouble their talent and creativity in the fields of fashion, humour, theatre and song...
